ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.framework

Class ExpenseClaimController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.framework.ExpenseClaimController

  • public class ExpenseClaimController
extends Object
    Acts as an interface between an ExpenseClaim view and the ExpenseClaimList model. Use ExpenseClaimController.getInstance() to get the singleton object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExpenseClaimController(Context context)
      Default constructor.
